Html: Anyone know how to set print attributes such as scale or fit to height and width?  I'm parsing a large amount of text and creating a couple hunderd 1 page excel spreadsheets.  The recipient basically just prints them out for shipping.  However, the current spreadsheet doesn't fit on one page, which is what I need to fix.  Any thoughts?

Nevermind, found it.  I didn't see it in the documentation, bit it is in pagesetup.php.

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getPageSetup()->setFitToHeight('1');
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getPageSetup()->setFitToWidth('1');
